effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user plays rough with the target and attacks it.
This may also lower the target’s Attack stat.
